segments.text: I can't take my eyes off that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched upward, reaching deep into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool beneath him is clearly unstable, it looks like it's about to go.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out at a dangerous angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One more slight shift in weight, and he's going down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn't the woman hear the creaks or feel the vibrations?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, anticipating her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely unaware of the imminent danger to her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before there's a serious fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how easily this could be avoided.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself, or worse, break the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR
